jec.title: Offensive Hacking & Cyber Awareness
jec.Short Description: A 2-hour practical workshop on real-world offensive hacking and cyber hygiene.
jec.Description: For successfully completing the 2-hour live training on Offensive Hacking & Cyber Awareness organized by CappricioSec University. Topics covered included: Mobile Hacking and Spyware, Webcam Hacking, Drone Security, IVR Scams, and Cyber Hygiene. This workshop empowers participants with hands-on knowledge to identify and defend against modern cyber threats in everyday life.
PREREQUISITES: Willingness to learn and protect oneself online
What you'll learn: Real-life Mobile Hacking Techniques and Spyware Detection
Webcam Hacking Risks and How to Prevent Them
IVR Scam Awareness and How to Stay Safe
Protecting Yourself in the Digital Age

jeccse.title: Offensive Hacking & Defensive Hacking
jeccse.Short Description: A practical workshop covering core cybersecurity concepts and real-world hacking techniques.
jeccse.Description: For successfully completing the live training on Offensive Hacking & Cybersecurity Fundamentals organized by CappricioSec University. Topics covered included: Password Cracking, No Rate Limiting Vulnerabilities, SQL Injection Attacks, Rate Limiting Bypass, IVR Scam Techniques, Drone Camera Hacking, Keylogger Attacks, Social Media Hacking, Camera Hacking, and an Introduction to Cybersecurity. This session focuses on understanding real-world attack methods and learning how to defend against them effectively.
PREREQUISITES: Willingness to learn ethical hacking concepts
What you'll learn: Password Cracking Techniques and Defense Strategies
SQL Injection Attacks and Prevention Methods
Rate Limiting Bypass and Security Best Practices
IVR Scam Techniques and How to Stay Safe
Drone Camera and Surveillance Security Risks
Social Media Account Hacking Risks and Protection
Camera Hacking Threats and How to Secure Devices
Introduction to Cybersecurity and Digital Safety
